exports.name: NextFunction
exports.description: A function type that, when called, executes the next middleware in the pipeline. Can be async or synchronous. Signature: () => Promise<void> | void

exports.name: MiddlewareContext
exports.description: The context object passed to each middleware function, containing request information (path, method, headers, body) and a shared state object for passing data between middleware

exports.name: MiddlewareFn
exports.description: The signature for a middleware function. Takes a MiddlewareContext and NextFunction, and can be async or synchronous. Signature: (ctx: MiddlewareContext, next: NextFunction) => Promise<void> | void

exports.name: PipelineOptions
exports.description: Configuration options for the MiddlewarePipeline, including timeoutMs (milliseconds before timeout) and onError (error callback handler)

exports.name: MiddlewarePipeline
exports.description: Main class for creating and managing middleware pipelines. Provides methods to add middleware (use), execute the pipeline (execute), inspect the pipeline (count), reset it (clear), and create sub-pipelines (branch)
